input.sentences: the wedding was located close to the water .
eating that cake was so delicious .
the evening ended with a beautiful sunset .
output.sentences: This summer, we attended our friends' wedding on the water.
We got to see so many of our friends that we haven't seen in a long time.
The reception was gorgeous, with lots of delicious food.
When they cut the cake, they decided not to smash a piece on each other's faces.
We ended the night by watching a beautiful fiery sunset.
